choices.text: A workflow using many long-lived branches
A workflow where developers integrate to main frequently, using short-lived branches
Only working on the main branch without any branches
A way to store code in tree structures

question: What are feature flags used for?

choices.text: To enable/disable features in code without deploying new code

question: What is the Git Forking workflow typically used for?

choices.text: Open source projects where contributors don't have write access

question: Monorepo and polyrepo are strategies for organizing multiple projects.
What is the purpose of using Git submodules?

choices.text: To include external repositories within your repository
